ETYMOLOGY: From Old English hōc 'a bend, corner, angle, hook', from Proto-Germanic *hōkaz. Related to Dutch hoek, German Haken.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A piece of material, usually metal, curved or bent back at an angle, for catching hold of or hanging things on.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 通常由金属制成，弯曲或折回成一定角度的物件，用于钩住或悬挂物品。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She hung her coat on the hook behind the door.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她把外套挂在门后的钩子上。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A verb is a word or phrase that describes an action, condition, or experience.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To catch, fasten, or secure something or someone with a hook.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 用钩子钩住、固定或系牢某物或某人。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He carefully hooked the fish and then released it.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他小心翼翼地钩住鱼，然后把它放生了。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A catchy musical phrase or lyrical line in a song that makes it memorable and appealing.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 歌曲中一段容易记住的旋律或歌词，使其具有吸引力和感染力。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: That song has such a great hook; I can't get it out of my head.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 那首歌的副歌真是太棒了，我完全忘不掉。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A short, swinging punch delivered with the elbow bent, typically aimed at the side of an opponent's head or body.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 肘部弯曲的短促摆拳，通常瞄准对手的头部或身体侧面。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The boxer landed a powerful left hook, stunning his opponent.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 拳击手打出了一记有力的左勾拳，震住了对手。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A verb is a word or phrase that describes an action, condition, or experience.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To attract, entice, or get someone addicted to something, often something they might not otherwise do or enjoy.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 吸引、诱惑或使某人对某事上瘾，通常是他们原本不会做或不喜欢的事情。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The first episode of the series completely hooked me; I had to watch them all.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这个系列剧的第一集就彻底把我吸引住了；我必须看完所有集。
